modName: Ambre Greenham - Racemenu Preset and Custom Follower
descriptionHtml:
[center][u] Ambre Greenham: Standalone Follower and Racemenu Preset[/u]

Ambre is a mostly-Breton Mage specialising in Conjuration and Destruction. She is available as a Racemenu Preset as well as a standalone, marryable Follower, and can be found in Candlehearth Hall in Windhelm.

[b]********[/b][b][u]
[/u][/b][/center]
[i][center]Born the bastard child of a Half-Altmer Nord and a High Rock Native, Ambre Greenham was born with a natural affinity for magic 
that gave her an edge over other students. She could have gone far had she ever gained the will to study - but Ambre, 
like her mother before her, is a dreamer.

She was brought up on stories of Skyrim's bitter snows and harsh tundra, 
soothed in her cradle with tales of dragons and Sovngarde. Long after her mother fell victim to sickness, the fantasy remained. 

Eventually Ambre left her dreary life behind and, seduced with visions of romance and heroism, made her way to Skyrim. 
There she would find her fortune, her fame - and her happiness. 

What she hadn't truly expected to find was a war-torn country on the edge of apocalypse.[/center][/i]
[b][center]********

Many thanks to TheWorldofRipX for his wonderful video!

[youtube]7sH0gx0e-_Y[/youtube]



[/center][/b]
To install:

1) [u]Racemenu Preset 
[/u]
Drop '.jslot' file in Data/SKSE/Chargen/Presets, and drop the '.nif' and '.dds' files 
in Data/SKSE/Chargen.
When in racemenu, select the 'presets' tab and hit F9 to choose a preset. You can then also navigate to 
the 'Sculpt' Tab and import the '.nif' file for Ambre to ensure the mesh is correct.

2) [u]Custom Follower
[/u]
Drop the 'Data' file in your main Skyrim directory and let the folder merge with your 
current 'Data' File. Activate the .esp, and voila!
You can find Ambre in Candlehearth Hall, Windhelm.


[u]Credits:[/u]
